title: minecraft联机时自己进的来。朋友进不去。
author: guo3338242
txt_content:
用的蛤蟆吃。server是这样的：
#Minecraft server properties
#Sat Jan 19 17:29:47 CST 2013
allow-nether=true
level-name=world
enable-query=false
allow-flight=false
server-port=25565
level-type=DEFAULT
enable-rcon=false
level-seed=
server-ip=
max-build-height=256
spawn-npcs=true
white-list=false
spawn-animals=true

pvp=true
difficulty=1
gamemode=0
max-players=20
spawn-monsters=true
generate-structures=true
view-distance=10
motd=A Minecraft Server

自己能进！求解！！

replies.author: Bite_dream
replies.txt_content:
#Minecraft server properties
#Tue Jan 15 19:20:26 CST 2013
generator-settings=
allow-nether=true
level-name=world
enable-query=false
allow-flight=false
server-port=25565
level-type=DEFAULT
enable-rcon=false
level-seed=
server-ip=这里填你的HamachiIP
max-build-height=256
spawn-npcs=true
white-list=false
spawn-animals=true
snooper-enabled=true
hardcore=false
texture-pack=

pvp=true

gamemode=0
max-players=20
spawn-monsters=true
generate-structures=true
view-distance=10
spawn-protection=16
motd=A Minecraft Server
复制吧 孩纸。。

replies.author: guo3338242
replies.txt_content:
Bite_dream 发表于 2013-1-19 22:39 
#Minecraft server properties
#Tue Jan 15 19:20:26 CST 2013
generator-settings=
我已经搞定，是我用的是路由器。

replies.author: guo3338242
replies.txt_content:
Bite_dream 发表于 2013-1-19 22:39 
#Minecraft server properties
#Tue Jan 15 19:20:26 CST 2013
generator-settings=
10块钱就给你了

replies.author: guo3338242
replies.txt_content:
Bite_dream 发表于 2013-1-19 22:59 
Thank you！！！！！！！
我不是坑你，我是看见了去试一试，就好了

replies.author: Bite_dream
replies.txt_content: 对了 给你点温馨提示：Hamachi联机非常卡。。如果你离联机的童鞋很近 当我没说

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: kenan1212
replies.txt_content:
guo3338242 发表于 2013-1-19 23:19 
哦，谢谢。
LZ能教一下么,我和你情况差不多,我是路由器.
用蛤蟆建了一个服务器.白名单和online也都关了.
但是朋友连不上.

replies.author: guo3338242
replies.txt_content:
kenan1212 发表于 2013-1-20 16:45 
LZ能教一下么,我和你情况差不多,我是路由器.
用蛤蟆建了一个服务器.白名单和online也都关了.
但是朋友连 ...
可以.你不能用无线路由器连网，把线直接连在电脑上，用宽带联网。
